snippet: Irving H. Picard argued that New York State’s settlement with the financier J. Ezra Merkin interfered with his exclusive right to seek money for the victims.
abstract: Irving H Picard, trustee liquidating Bernard L Madoff's assets, argues that New York State’s $410 million settlement with the hedge fund manager J Ezra Merkin interferes with his exclusive right to seek money for the Ponzi scheme victims.
lead_paragraph: Irving H. Picard argued that New York State’s settlement with the financier J. Ezra Merkin interfered with his exclusive right to seek money for the victims.

headline.seo: Trustee for Madoff Victims Fights Settlement
